page_content: Discusses the conditions for salary continuation during illness for employees in different types of employment contracts.
Provides an archive of newsletters from the Department for Education and Culture for the year 2019, covering various topics.
Discusses the issue of littering and provides information on combating it, including an online toolbox and guidelines for waste-free events.
Discusses a six-year project focused on humus management in agriculture, supported by the Federal Office for Agriculture.
Discusses the Agrarinformationssystem GELAN, a software solution for managing agricultural data, including direct payments and disease prevention.
Provides information about Human Papillomavirus (HPV), its risks, and the HPV vaccination program in the Canton of Solothurn.
Provides information on the process for schools to report teacher data to the Volksschulamt at the beginning of the new school year.
